rev.comment: Replaceable fair use; even if he was caught, he'd still be out of prison long before his natural life would be over.

Line 1: Line 1: â
[[Image:Nicola Panaro.jpg|thumb|300px|Mug shot of Nicola Panaro.]]
  â  
'''Nicola Panaro''' (born in [[Casal di Principe]], September 12, 1968), is an Italian [[Camorra|Camorrista]] and member in the [[Casalesi clan]] from [[Casal di Principe]] in the [[province of Caserta]] between [[Naples]] and [[Salerno]]. He is currently wanted by Italian justice and has been on the "[[List of most wanted fugitives in Italy|most wanted list]]" of the Italian ministry of the Interior since [[2003]], for murder and membership in the Camorra. He has yet to serve a prison sentence of nine years and four months. On January 8, 2009, an international warrant was issued against him, to be arrested for extradition.<ref>{{it icon}} [http://www.interno.it/mininterno/export/sites/default/it/sezioni/sala_stampa/notizie/polizia/Latitante_panaro_nicola.html Direzione centrale della Polizia Criminale - Programma Speciale di Ricerca - Nicola Panaro]</ref>
'''Nicola Panaro''' (born in [[Casal di Principe]], September 12, 1968), is an Italian [[Camorra|Camorrista]] and member in the [[Casalesi clan]] from [[Casal di Principe]] in the [[province of Caserta]] between [[Naples]] and [[Salerno]]. He is currently wanted by Italian justice and has been on the "[[List of most wanted fugitives in Italy|most wanted list]]" of the Italian ministry of the Interior since [[2003]], for murder and membership in the Camorra. He has yet to serve a prison sentence of nine years and four months. On January 8, 2009, an international warrant was issued against him, to be arrested for extradition.<ref>{{it icon}} [http://www.interno.it/mininterno/export/sites/default/it/sezioni/sala_stampa/notizie/polizia/Latitante_panaro_nicola.html Direzione centrale della Polizia Criminale - Programma Speciale di Ricerca - Nicola Panaro]</ref>
